title: [ATTN: Riot] Your BEST ARAM Performance
body:
there is a survival mode... but ppl dont take it serious
there is a full battle mode... but ppl dont take it serious
there is a thrill of, being forced to play as different roles & champions...
but ppl dont see it that way...

but what if aram is to become a mode for the serious??
what if, you achieved a perfect on aram?
what is, the longest kill streak??
how many champions, have you really mastered??
or, if aram were to happen, on different map?

i present a challenge to the creators & players
expand on battle mode... and not just "objectives" of SR
find out, who is the ultimate survivalist & killer, with as many champions as possible,
& not thru "one" choice wonders... but by randomization...

to kick things off i have a chart version of what i think is,
the best legendary performance since i started...
but others might have done better, but... for all aram-ers, let's have a goal to aim at,
instead of "its just aram..."
show everyone your best performance, & let us begin.... the real, aram challenge.
what's yours??

[edit]
well, since uploads not working... here's the match i was refering to:
http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/82067528/201172994?tab=overview

- unofficial penta
- 19 kill streak
- unofficial perfect, since everything happened after the first death


- leung
